com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library

Interface ILoadingLayout

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlipLoadingLayout, LoadingLayout, LoadingLayoutProxy, RotateLoadingLayout

    public interface ILoadingLayout

    • Method Detail

      • setLastUpdatedLabel

        void setLastUpdatedLabel(java.lang.CharSequence label)
        Set the Last Updated Text. This displayed under the main label when Pulling
        Parameters:
        label - - Label to set

      • setLoadingDrawable

        void setLoadingDrawable(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        Set the drawable used in the loading layout. This is the same as calling setLoadingDrawable(drawable, Mode.BOTH)
        Parameters:
        drawable - - Drawable to display

      • setPullLabel

        void setPullLabel(java.lang.CharSequence pullLabel)
        Set Text to show when the Widget is being Pulled setPullLabel(releaseLabel, Mode.BOTH)
        Parameters:
        pullLabel - - CharSequence to display

      • setRefreshingLabel

        void setRefreshingLabel(java.lang.CharSequence refreshingLabel)
        Set Text to show when the Widget is refreshing setRefreshingLabel(releaseLabel, Mode.BOTH)
        Parameters:
        refreshingLabel - - CharSequence to display

      • setReleaseLabel

        void setReleaseLabel(java.lang.CharSequence releaseLabel)
        Set Text to show when the Widget is being pulled, and will refresh when released. This is the same as calling setReleaseLabel(releaseLabel, Mode.BOTH)
        Parameters:
        releaseLabel - - CharSequence to display

      • setTextTypeface

        void setTextTypeface(android.graphics.Typeface tf)
        Set's the Sets the typeface and style in which the text should be displayed. Please see TextView#setTypeface(Typeface).
